statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT post_text, interaction_time FROM social_media_interactions WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT id, user_id FROM social_media_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM social_media_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions WHERE post_text LIKE '%exciting%';
SELECT id, user_id, post_text, interaction_time, sentiment_score FROM social_media_interactions WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_interactions FROM social_media_interactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC
SELECT user_id, AVG(sentiment_score) as avg_sentiment FROM social_media_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_sentiment > 0.3
SELECT post_text, interaction_time FROM social_media_interactions WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY interaction_time ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions WHERE post_text LIKE '%exciting%' OR post_text LIKE '%amazing%'
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions WHERE user_id = 1234;
SELECT post_text, likes_count FROM social_media_interactions WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT interaction_date, post_text FROM social_media_interactions WHERE comments_count < 50;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.75;
SELECT interaction_id, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, likes_count, comments_count FROM social_media_interactions WHERE user_id=12345 AND likes_count > 100 ORDER BY likes_count DESC;

SELECT user_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM social_media_interactions JOIN sentiment_analysis ON social_media_interactions.interaction_id = sentiment_analysis.interaction_id WHERE sentiment_score >= 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;

SELECT user_id, likes_count, comments_count, sentiment_category FROM social_media_interactions JOIN sentiment_analysis ON social_media_interactions.interaction_id = sentiment_analysis.interaction_id WHERE likes_count > 50 AND sentiment_category='positive' ORDER BY comments_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions WHERE post_text LIKE '%exciting%' AND likes_count > comments_count ORDER BY likes_count-comments_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM BrandReputation;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM BrandReputation WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT brand_name, interaction_type, sentiment_score FROM BrandReputation WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.4 AND 0.6;
SELECT * FROM BrandReputation ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM BrandReputation WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT brand_name, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM BrandReputation INNER JOIN CustomerFeedback ON BrandReputation.post_id = CustomerFeedback.post_id GROUP BY brand_name ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT brand_name, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment_score FROM BrandReputation GROUP BY brand_name HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 3.5 ORDER BY avg_sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brands ORDER BY brand_reputation_score DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE account_created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE account_created_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brands WHERE brand_reputation_score > 8.0 ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT i.interaction_id, u.username, b.brand_name, f.feedback_text FROM interactions i JOIN users u ON i.user_id = u.user_id JOIN brands b ON u.username = b.brand_name JOIN feedback f ON i.interaction_id = f.interaction_id WHERE i.sentiment_score < 0.0 ORDER BY i.interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT brand_name, average_rating FROM Brand_Overview;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM User_Interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM Sentiment_Analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date, feedback_content FROM Customer_Feedback LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email, account_creation_date FROM User_Profile WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT brand_name, average_rating FROM Brand_Overview WHERE average_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM User_Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT brand_name, positive_reviews_count, negative_reviews_count FROM Brand_Overview ORDER BY positive_reviews_count DESC, negative_reviews_count ASC;
SELECT ua.analysis_id, sa.sentiment_score, sa.sentiment_category FROM Sentiment_Analysis sa JOIN User_Interactions ua ON sa.review_id = ua.user_id WHERE sa.sentiment_score < 0;
SELECT up.username, cf.feedback_date, cf.feedback_content FROM Customer_Feedback cf JOIN User_Profile up ON cf.user_id = up.user_id;
